code: import React from'react';import"./Cart.css";import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartTotal=function CartTotal(){var cartItems=useSelector(function(state){return state.cart.items;});var calculateTotalSum=function calculateTotalSum(){var totalSum=0;cartItems.forEach(function(item){totalSum+=item.totalPrice;});return totalSum;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-total",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Total Sum:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",calculateTotalSum().toFixed(2)]})]});};export default CartTotal;
